name: DataTransferItem
description: The DataTransferItem object represents one drag data item. During a drag operation, each drag event has a dataTransfer property which contains a list of drag data items. Each item in the list is a DataTransferItem object.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'DataTransferItem' in HTML Living Standard.

refs.description: The definition of 'DataTransferItem.webkitGetAsEntry()' in File and Directory Entries API.
